Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class ProductionPowerExt

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.constant.model.ProductionPower
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.ProductionPowerExt
public class ProductionPowerExt
extends ProductionPower
ProductionPowerExt class. Extends ProductionPower. Manage the production power.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    ProductionPowerExt()
    Instantiates an empty Production power ext.
    ProductionPowerExt​(int points, NumberOfResources outputRes, NumberOfResources inputRes)
    Instantiates a new Production power ext without resources of your choice.
    ProductionPowerExt​(int points, NumberOfResources outputRes, NumberOfResources inputRes, int ofYourChoiceInput, int ofYourChoiceOutput)
    Instantiates a new Production power ext.
    ProductionPowerExt​(NumberOfResources outputRes, NumberOfResources inputRes)
    Instantiates a new Production power ext without resources of your choice and faithpoints.

  • Method Details

    • add

      public ProductionPowerExt add​(ProductionPower other)
      Description copied from class: ProductionPower
      Sum of production powers. It's usefull for active production in parallel.
      Overrides:
      add in class ProductionPower
      Parameters:
      other - of type ProductionPower: the production power that has to be add.
      Returns:
      of type ProductionPowerExt: a new ProductionPowerExt which has this attributes plus the param other attributes.

    • active

      public void active​(PlayerExt owner) throws OutOfResourcesException, ChoseResourcesException
      Active a production power without resources of your choice.
      Parameters:
      owner - of type PlayerExt: the production power's owner.
      Throws:
      OutOfResourcesException - the out of resources exception
      ChoseResourcesException - the chose resources exception

    • active

      public void active​(PlayerExt owner, NumberOfResources choiceInput, NumberOfResources choiceOutput) throws OutOfResourcesException, ChoseResourcesException
      Active.
      Parameters:
      owner - of type PlayerExt: the production power's owner.
      choiceInput - of type NumberOfResources: resources of your choice in input.
      choiceOutput - of type NumberOfResources: resources of your choice in output.
      Throws:
      OutOfResourcesException - the out of resources exception
